titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to report biennially on actions taken to address areas of concerns that led to the inclusion of veterans health care in the High Risk List of the Government Accountability Office, and for other purposes.
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2018
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
